nodes.name: Tech Support
nodes.desc: S.M.A.R.T. uses this node's security as a test mission. Defeat all the security software to proceed.

dialogue.text: DISARRAY: Are you the newbie? I saw you beat the test run.
DISARRAY: I'm a fellow S.M.A.R.T. agent on patrol. I was just executing some 1337 hacks in security level 2. Where are you headed next?
DISARRAY: Cool. You'll definitely want to grab some better programs. Have you checked out the level 1 Warez node? I'll show you where it is. Later.

nodes.name: S.M.A.R.T. HQ
nodes.desc: Center for information about S.M.A.R.T. and its operations.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Hey. Welcome to S.M.A.R.T. You must be the newbie I'm supposed to train.
SUPERPHREAK: Great. I hope you're a fast learner, cause I have more important things to do than hold your hand all day.

responses.text: I'll be sure to check that out.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: As a S.M.A.R.T. agent, you're here to fix problems and battle info-crime. You can find out more at the S.M.A.R.T. HQ node.

responses.text: So what do I do with them?

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: What you're looking at is the netmap. It shows you all the network nodes and the connections between them.

SUPERPHREAK: You can click on a node to have your spybot set up a link to that computer. Once you're inside you'll need to databattle with that node's defensive programs. By the way, right now your security level is 1, so you can only access level 1 nodes.

responses.text: Wait. Can you go over all that again?

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Good. Time to get down to action. I'm going to walk you through your first databattle and give you some tips. Ready to get the party started?
Welcome to your first databattle. Here, your programs duke it out with the enemy programs for control of a node.

nodes.name: PR Database
nodes.desc: This node is infected with an unknown corrupted program. Destroy all the corrupted software to proceed.

dialogue.text: SPINNER: Hey pal. I see that you've been doing some sweet code slinging. Was wondering if you were interested in some extra business.

SPINNER: Not exactly. I'm more of a freelancer. Sometimes corporations get themselves into messes that need cleaning up. Their agents contact me and I contact individual S.M.A.R.T. operatives to see if they're interested. What do you think?

responses.text: What do you need me to do?

dialogue.text: SPINNER: A little side business in data policing. It turns out Pharmhaus was testing some new security and it went haywire. They can't even access their network.
SPINNER: Well, Pharmhaus is offering a nice shiny piece of software for someone to quietly access their node and disable the security system. What do you think?
SPINNER: No problem. Take your time. I'll just put the node up on your netmap for when you make up your mind. See you around.
SPINNER: Great! I'll put the node up on your netmap. See you around.

nodes.name: Club Center
nodes.desc: This node has reported a security bug that has locked down its internal network. Defeat the security software to proceed.

dialogue.text: WINTERMUTANT: Hey dude. Sorry to interrupt an elite S.M.A.R.T. agent like yourself. Is it ok if we chat for a sec?

responses.text: Where did you hear about problems?

dialogue.text: WINTERMUTANT: I'm sort of a hacker too. I mean I'd like to be one. I hope you don't mind that I've been checking out your radical runs. Taking care of the Doctor Donut problems?

responses.text: Could you tell me where that is?
Give me the info about the shop.

dialogue.text: WINTERMUTANT: Oh, I saw S.M.A.R.T. had crashed and I decided to do some snooping. They got hit by a recent hack job and their systems are all buggy.
WINTERMUTANT: Sure, I'll send it to you right away. I know I've got it around here somewhere. Hang on a sec...
WINTERMUTANT: I'm uploading the node on to your netmap now. Kewl talkin' to you. CUL8R.

nodes.name: Communications Hub
nodes.desc: This node is reporting corrupted program problems similar to the Pharmhaus intrusions. Destroy the corrupted software.

dialogue.text: BOAVENTURA: Hello, agent. I suppose I should thank you for assisting my company.
BOAVENTURA: Good to see that S.M.A.R.T. is fulfilling its professional responsibilities. Along those lines, I have a task for you to perform.
An experimental piece of software, along with whatever credits you can find during the mission.
BOAVENTURA: Use a backdoor through the P.E.D.C. Fiduciary Node to access our Sysadmin Archives. The archives locked down after an aborted crash attempt, and we need a file from there immediately.
BOAVENTURA: I'm adding the archives node to your netmap. I'll contact you when you are in the vicinity of the node.

nodes.name: Network City
nodes.desc: Brought to you by New Future Technologies- Software options for the here and beyond.

dialogue.text: TSUMARA285: Hello, consumer. Welcome to Network City, retailer for future net technologies. Selling software for the here and beyond.

nodes.name: Inventory Archives
nodes.desc: This node's security is hyperalert after a recent hack job. Disable it to proceed to the Warez node.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Hey, newbie. Still working on getting S.M.A.R.T. on its feet. What are you up to?
SUPERPHREAK: He's a good kid. By the way, that node up there is Network City. And there are a couple more Warez nodes hidden out on the net.

SUPERPHREAK: While you're looking at software, don't jsut load up on attack programs. You should check out some meta programs like medic and turbo. There may come a time when you need to boost up your hack to handle an ----- enemy. ----- ---- Oops, gotta go.

nodes.name: Print Assets
nodes.desc: Deactivate the security at this node in order to proceed.

dialogue.text: WINTERMUTANT: Hey dude. It's me again.
WINTERMUTANT: Kewl battle! Hey, I was lookin' over some of the nodes you've been through and I found something funny. Whoever did the hack job through Pharmhaus left something behind.
WINTERMUTANT: Some kind of weird program. I couldn't get a good look at it 'cause it disappeared before I could catch it.
I'm not sure. I saw a link to something called Nightfall. I'll keep checking the logs and see if I can find anything else.

nodes.name: Banane System
nodes.desc: This node contains the level 3 access codes. Capture the code to access level 3 nodes.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Nice work. You keep going at this rate, you may be an elite agent yet. Welcome to level 3.
SUPERPHREAK: I'm starting to see a strong pattern throughout the net. These intrusions and corruptions aren't isolated incidents.

responses.text: What can I do to help?

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: And S.M.A.R.T. is still going down every few minutes. It all adds up to some kind of big conspiracy.
SUPERPHREAK: Like something that's going to damage the whole net. Keep looking around. I'll upgrade you to security level 3 now.

nodes.name: Employee Records
nodes.desc: This node is infected with an unknown corrupted program. Destroy all the corrupted software to proceed.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Newbie, are you reading me?
SUPERPHREAK: Great. I have some information for ----- ---- ------------ --- ---------- -- ------ --- -------

nodes.name: Memory Tower #43
nodes.desc: This node is infected with an unknown corrupted program. Destroy all the corrupted software to proceed.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Hey. Not bad ---- ----- so far ---- You're almost -------- ready for level 2 -------- access.

responses.text: Where do I find the codes?

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Hmm... --- something -- ------ weird's going on. I think I ---- breaking up. ------ Look, you've got ---- get the access codes.

responses.text: Where do I find the codes?

nodes.name: Government Affairs
nodes.desc: Pharmhaus offered this mission in exchange for a new piece of software. Deactivate all the malfunctioning security units.

dialogue.text: SPINNER: Hey, I knew I could count on you! Pharmhaus is reporting everything all clear. Here's the software they promised.

nodes.name: Eastern Distribution Site
nodes.desc: This node contains the logs related to the Pharmhaus and Cellular Automata corrupted programs. Retrieve the logs to succeed in this mission.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Hey, good work. The logs you just found will be really helpful. We need all the data we can get to figure out what's going on.
SUPERPHREAK: Hmm, just keep hacking .. .... nodes to see if you can ------- some more logs. Watch out for corporate ------------, and don't forget what you learned using Bit-Man. L8R.

nodes.name: Sydney Project
nodes.desc: This node contains the level 2 access codes. Capture the code to access level 2 nodes.

responses.text: Why did you get cut off before?

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Yeah, I'm back. I see you got the access codes. I think I'll have time to upgrade your status and show you a new Warez node before I get cut off again.
SUPERPHREAK: Someone's been screwing around with S.M.A.R.T. Some kind of corrupt program got loose in our network and got cut off. For a second, I thought it was 12AM out here.

SUPERPHREAK: 12AM = midnight. That's what we call a total network blackout- no access for anybody. It happened once a while ago during the worldwide power crisis. You wouldn't believe how bad it got before the network came back online.

responses.text: What can I do to help?

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Anyway, someone directly sabotaged S.M.A.R.T. and it's crippling our agents. It's not affecting you because we haven't put your info into the S.M.A.R.T. system yet.
SUPERPHREAK: I'm not sure yet. I'm going to keep looking into it. But with all of us popping in and out, I guess that leaves you as the only functional agent.
SUPERPHREAK: I ran a trace on the problem that led back to the Luckey Monkey Eastern Distribution Site. Someone must have sent the corrupt program from there.
SUPERPHREAK: I guess you should see if you can pick up the local records. I'll get back to you when I can.

nodes.name: Leo's Shop
nodes.desc: A quality shop of basic programs at low prices. Come and see what we've got to offer.

dialogue.text: Leo: Welcome, kid. How's it going? I got just the software to make things easier for you out there. Drop on by if you wanna see.

nodes.name: Clinical Trial Database
nodes.desc: Superphreak asked for the logs of this node to find a pattern in the corrupt program attacks. Collect the logs to succeed.

dialogue.text: DISARRAY: Hello again.
DISARRAY: Nice work on that last node. I was just coming to check it out myself. I guess the work here is done.
DISARRAY: What do I mean? I just took care of the rest of the nodes in this area. Everything's totally clean.
DISARRAY: Look, kid, I'm a MUCH better hacker than you are. If I tell you they're clean, they're clean. Check you later.

nodes.name: Toy Properties
nodes.desc: Disarray said he took care of this node, but security seems unusually active...

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Wow. Good thing you checked out this node. This whole area's a mess.
SUPERPHREAK: From what I can tell, the problem with program corruption is escalating.
SUPERPHREAK: I'm not sure. But there's got to be some useful information in those logs you picked up. Since I can't seem to stay on the net for more than 5 minutes, I'll keep analyzing the logs.

SUPERPHREAK: Work your way across these nodes. Somebody's hiding something from us. See if you can find out what it is. Welcome to the big time, newbie. Send me those logs so I can get started. Ready to receive data.

nodes.name: Ready To Ware
nodes.desc: A selection of the finer software on the net. For the discerning customer only.

dialogue.text: Kimoni: Welcome. Be assured that you will find no better than Kimoni's shop anywhere on the net. The question is, do you have the credits to make this worth our while?

nodes.name: Off-Shore Transactions
nodes.desc: Firewalls and heavy defenses are keeping all users out. Disable all the defenses to keep moving.

responses.text: Did you miss that last databattle?

dialogue.text: DISARRAY: Hey. What are you doing here? Didn't I tell you I cleaned this area up already?

responses.text: Looks like you need some help.
SUPERPHREAK told me to check it out.

dialogue.text: DISARRAY: Why don't you scram and let me take care of these nodes?
DISARRAY: Hey, if you want, go ahead and keep hacking. You won't get very far before security beats you back to level 1. Contact me when you get stuck.

nodes.name: Vaccine Database
nodes.desc: Firewalls and heavy defenses are keeping all users out. Disable all the defenses to reopen the node.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: ----- --- ------- -- ------ ---- Man, it's hard to stay connected. Nice work so far.
SUPERPHREAK: I used a neural net sequencer to cross-reference all of the logs you've given me so far. I was able to trace the programs back to the nodes that originally spawned them onto the net.
SUPERPHREAK: Just suspicions for now, but I did find a central location. A new node. Not sure how it connects- Maybe a backdoor somewhere.
SUPERPHREAK: You're doing an excellent job. Keep on hacking and tell me what you find. I'll load the new node on your netmap now.

nodes.name: HMO Procedure Management
nodes.desc: This node contains the level 4 access codes. Capture the code to access level 4 nodes.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Excellent work. Welcome to level 4.

responses.text: Do you think I can handle it?

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: No problem. You earned it. Now try to get to that mysterious node I showed you. Something big is going down, and it looks like it's up to you to stop it.
SUPERPHREAK: I know you can. S.M.A.R.T. is counting on you. Get ready for the level 4 upgrade. And good luck.

nodes.name: Supply Management
nodes.desc: This is one of the malfunctioning nodes Wintermutant mentioned. Disable the security to repair the damage.

dialogue.text: DISARRAY: Still up out there?

responses.text: I don't know. What is it?

dialogue.text: DISARRAY: Of course I'm still online. Nothing this puny is going to take a hacker of my skills down. Anyway, I've been digging around and I found something. Do you have time to check it out?

DISARRAY: S.M.A.R.T. has a special program that would really help with the crashing and all. To get it running I need a couple of files that are hidden in some corporate nodes around here. Two nodes, to be exact
DISARRAY: Network software. It's encrypted network software. I'm going to need a lot of time to decipher it. Can you shut down security so I can get in there and concentrate on the real work?
DISARRAY: OK. You can get to the nodes through this one. They're all level 3, so you'll have to get the access code for that level first.
DISARRAY: I'll load the first node onto your map now. Hack that to access the nodes that contain the program. I'll catch up with you when you've taken care of the security. Later newbie.

nodes.name: Franchise Office
nodes.desc: This is one of the malfunctioning nodes Wintermutant mentioned. Disable the security to repair the damage.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: OK, I'm finally back on the net. Hey, news on the S.M.A.R.T. bug.

responses.text: Do you have any idea who's responsible?

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Looks like it must have been an inside job. Just happened too quickly. The hacker had the passwords.
SUPERPHREAK: A couple ideas, but nothing definite. I'll keep working on it. Still, as the only S.M.A.R.T. agent left, you'll have to handle the net problems.
SUPERPHREAK: Hold on. Not possible. S.M.A.R.T.'s down. Who was this agent?

responses.text: What do we do about him?
He asked me to do a mission.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: If you're talking about who I think you are, that's bad news. I was training an agent named DISARRAY a couple months ago. He got thrown out for being the reckless and greedy loser that he is. Don't trust a word he says.
SUPERPHREAK: ---- ------ -- don't have a lot of time left. I'll start tracing DISARRAY. Go along with his idea so I can see what he's doing. Oh, and -- ------ ------- -- ---- --

nodes.name: Fiduciary Node
nodes.desc: This node is a backdoor entrance to the cellular automata S.A. archives. Disable the security here to proceed.

responses.text: I'm already on a couple of missions.

dialogue.text: SPINNER: Hey, agent. You've been pretty hot lately. Looking for some extra work?

responses.text: What do I get out of this?

dialogue.text: SPINNER: For a hacker of your talent, this should be a breeze. All you have to do is rescue some files from a P.E.D.C. executive who stole them.
SPINNER: Pharmhaus is offering a nice credit bonus as a reward, and the best part is, the node is the P.E.D.C. node you just opened, the Re-Insurance Database.
You know where to go. I'll contact you when you're finished.

nodes.name: Sub-Station Gamma
nodes.desc: This node is the gateway to the S.A. archives. Disable the security here to proceed.

dialogue.text: BOAVENTURA: Agent. I can see you're about to enter our Sysadmin Archives. Thank you for handling this mission. I wanted to give you some advice.
BOAVENTURA: If you are successful, we will reward you with a copy of some new software that we just developed. I'm told that's the proper way to motivate people such as yourself.
BOAVENTURA: Good luck, agent.

nodes.name: S.A. Archives
nodes.desc: This node is currently locked down, and Cellular Automata needs a file from it. Retrieve the file to win a new piece of software.

dialogue.text: BOAVENTURA: Well done, agent. You have accomplished your task, and I am happy to fulfill your task. I'm happy to fulfill the terms of our agreement. Prepare to receive the software we promised.

nodes.name: Market Research
nodes.desc: This node connects to the two nodes containing the program Disarray wanted. Disable security here to access these two nodes.

dialogue.text: WINTERMUTANT: Hey partner! You really cleaned up those Doctor Donut nodes!

responses.text: Any idea where it came from?

dialogue.text: WINTERMUTANT: I went sneaking around there after you left, and guess what? I found more traces of that weird program.
WINTERMUTANT: Totally! The traces had the same Nightfall signature, so I did this special kind of search I made up, and I found something.
WINTERMUTANT: A nice piece of software somebody made. It's stashed away deep in sector 4. In a lucky monkey node, not that they know it's there of course.
I'll put it up on your map. C U partner.
WINTERMUTANT: Not yet, but I'm gonna keep searching for the Nightfall hacker and see what else I find. I'll put the node up on your map. C U partner.

nodes.name: Flavor Evaluation Lab
nodes.desc: Half of the program Disarray wants is here. Collect the keys to temporarily shut down the node's surveillance and allow Disarray access.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Hey, I can see which program DISARRAY's getting. It has to do with rapid simultaneous network communication- Flooding a huge number of nodes at once.
SUPERPHREAK: I don't know. What would DISARRAY be doing that would affect the whole net? He'd still have to have hacked every node individually to be able to do anything.
SUPERPHREAK: Keep following him, and watch what he says. I'll keep up my trace and get back to you when I have more. L8R.

nodes.name: Beverage Subsidiaries
nodes.desc: Disable the security software in this node to proceed.

dialogue.text: SPINNER: Hey, pal. Got another job for you.
It's P.E.D.C.- They always offer sweet credit rewards.
SPINNER: A memory unit in the Privileged Accounts node went blue-screen and needs to be shut down, quietly. Should be a walk in the park for someone with your ability.
SPINNER: I'll put the node up on your map. And, between you and me, you may want to check out the rest of the connecting nodes too. Things seem a little screwy. Ciao.

nodes.name: Lucky Jungle Central
nodes.desc: Half of the program Disarray wants is here. Collect the keys to temporarily shut down the node's surveillance and allow Disarray access.

dialogue.text: DISARRAY: Terrific. Thanks for handling that security. I could have done it myself, but that saved me some time.
DISARRAY: Well, once the program is put together, everything will be set for S.M.A.R.T. See you soon.

nodes.name: Re-Insurance Database
nodes.desc: There is a large reward to recover stolen files from A PEDC executive. Pick up the files before security stops you.

dialogue.text: SPINNER: As always, an excellent job from the best agent S.M.A.R.T.'s got. Here are the credits they promised. Keep in touch. (ADD 500 CREDITS).

nodes.name: Assimilation Timetable
nodes.desc: An enemy hacker has heightened the security in this node and locked out all users. Defeat these programs to proceed.

dialogue.text: WINTERMUTANT: Wow, you're level 4! That's radical!!! I knew you'd make it!
WINTERMUTANT: I found something big! I finished my Nightfall search and I found another secret stash.
WINTERMUTANT: Some kind of access codes for a really tight private security set-up. It's hidden away in the Pharmhaus proprietary research node. Nasty defense software.
WINTERMUTANT: I'm putting the node on your map now. I tried to get them myself, but I got rejected before I could boot up. It's definitely Nightfall though.
WINTERMUTANT: Sure thing. Kick his butt! Go S.M.A.R.T.!

nodes.name: Agora
nodes.desc: The expert hacker's choice. This Warez shop deals excluesively in the rarest and most powerful software anywhere.

dialogue.text: MINERVA: Welcome- I'm glad to see your energy is flowing. I have the software you've been dreaming about. Are you ready to enter the magic circle?

nodes.name: Recipe Database
nodes.desc: The Nightfall hacker has heightened the security in this node and locked out all users. Defeat these programs to proceed.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: ----- ----- -- ----- It's --------- harder and harder to ----- ---- but I've got important information ---- --- Ready?

responses.text: What about that program he took?
What about the node he's in?

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: I finished my trace on DISARRAY. Surprise surprise, he's the source --- ---- ----- corrupt programs and security screw-ups. DISARRAY's been infiltrating ------ ----- ---- the web. I don't know why.

responses.text: Does Nightfall mean anything to you?

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: ----- ------- a well-guarded communications hub. He's using the stolem program --- ----- access to all the nodes on the net -- ---- I just don't understand the point. Any ideas?
SUPERPHREAK: Nightfall? What does that mean?
SUPERPHREAK: Nightfall... That's it! DISARRAY's ---- ---- use his nightfall program to black out the net. Total midnight! --- ----- --- crash the entire system. You have to stop him!
SUPERPHREAK: Get ------- ---- his personal node, defeat the security, --- deactivate the Nightfall program. And hurry, --- ----- have much time!

nodes.name: Film Properties
nodes.desc: Wintermutant found an experimental piece of software here. Retrieve the program before the corrupted programs left to protect it can disconnect you.

dialogue.text: WINTERMUTANT: That battle was sooo kewl! You rock! And managed to retrieve that experimental wizard software.

WINTERMUTANT: The program should be ready to use, just plug and play. Oh, one more thing. I've been scanning these nodes. Be sure to get some level 4 software and be ready for some nasty security. Go get 'em partner.

nodes.name: R&D Backup
nodes.desc: The Nightfall hacker has heightened the security in this node and locked out all users. Defeat these programs to proceed.

dialogue.text: BOAVENTURA: Agent. I'm glad I found you. We've got a big problem here.

responses.text: I'm a little busy right now.

dialogue.text: BOAVENTURA: We've found an undocumented node rerouting data to our system core. A security breach at this level is completely unacceptable. What are you going to do about it?
BOAVENTURA: If you can bypass our security, we'll set up a link to the undocumented node for you. That should give you access to whoever is causing this chaos.
BOAVENTURA: Be warned, agent. The security measures in our core are particularly fierce. Good luck.

nodes.name: System Core
nodes.desc: Deactivate the security system here and allow Joana to set up a link to Disarray's headquarters.

dialogue.text: BOAVENTURA: Congratulations, agent. You've opened up our system. As you can observe, we've established a link to that mysterious node. There is a problem, however.

responses.text: Don't worry. I'll get the codes.

dialogue.text: BOAVENTURA: The node has an unknown security level. We don't have the access codes to reach it. Without those codes, the node is inaccessible.
BOAVENTURA: We'll maintain the current link for you. Good luck and thank you, agent.

nodes.name: Executive Protocol
nodes.desc: Disarray has filled this node with corrupt programs set to attack anyone who logs in. Destroy these corrupted programs to proceed.

dialogue.text: DISARRAY: Hello there, S.M.A.R.T. amateur.
DISARRAY: What's the matter? No time to chat with an old S.M.A.R.T. buddy?

responses.text: Why are you trying to crash the net?

dialogue.text: DISARRAY: Clearly their loss. So I guess by now you know the whole Nightfall story, huh?
DISARRAY: Simple. The Nightfall software I set up is going to take every single node offline. That means I will control who gets access to the net and who doesn't.
DISARRAY: People will be begging me to get back online. And I'll let them, just as long as they're willing to pay for the privilege. I'll make billions. What can I say- it's a brilliant plan.

DISARRAY: Actually, it will. You don't have the codes to access my private node, and even if you did, you'd never beat my security. You're just a pathetic newbie. So why don't you stop wasting your time fighting me and go save up your credits to pay me off later?
DISARRAY: Suit yourself. It'll be fun to show you just how inferior you are. L8R, loser.

nodes.name: Treasury Funds
nodes.desc: Disarray has filled this node with corrupt programs set to attack anyone who logs in. Destroy these corrupted programs to proceed.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Hey. I guess you found out ------- ---- get the access codes for DISARRAY's node. Good work.. I'm looking into how to stall the nightfall software. You go get the ---- codes and the deactivate the program. But first ---- --- ---- ----- what I know about this jerk.
SUPERPHREAK: I'm sure DISARRAY ---- booby-trapped the node that has his access codes. I don't know ---- ---- ------ when you access that node.
SUPERPHREAK: If you've got any unfinished missions, complete them to -- ---- extra cash. ---- ------ back to Minerva's and stock up on Warez.

SUPERPHREAK: DISARRAY's tactics: I know that ------- - coward and will use ranged programs to keep you --- -- distance. Be prepared to see lots of radar and sonar along with -------- ------ ------ fought. I also know he deletes memory cells as a defense, so be sure ---
SUPERPHREAK: No problem. Did all of that make sense? -- ---- ---- pretty sure there will be no turning back.
SUPERPHREAK: All right, I'll be offline for a while. Good luck -------- ----- codes, and be sure --- show DISARRAY what it means to mess with S.M.A.R.T.

nodes.name: Privileged Accounts
nodes.desc: PEDC has offered a large credit reward to the agent who can destroy a malfunctioning memory cell. Eliminate the corrupted programs to succeed.

dialogue.text: SPINNER: Great work, agent. P.E.D.C. thanks you. So, mind letting little old SPINNER know what all the big, bad news is about?
SPINNER: No problem, no problem. Duty first and all that. Just don't forget who's been your friend, ok? Here are your credits. Ciao, buddy. (2000 credit reward)

nodes.name: Proprietary Research
nodes.desc: This node contains the access codes to a private security level. Capture the code to access security level 5.

dialogue.text: DISARRAY: Bravo, bravo! You have honestly surprised me. I never thought a newbie like you could get this far.
DISARRAY: I'm afraid not. You see, you're too late. My grand finale is already at hand. Is everybody ready? I hope you're not afraid of the dark. 3, 2, 1, Nightfall!

nodes.name: Unknown Node
nodes.desc: Disarray's headquarters. Defeat all of his security to disable the Nightfall software and prevent Midnight.

dialogue.text: SUPERPHREAK: Awesome job! That's how it's done!
SUPERPHREAK: You stood up for S.M.A.R.T. when everything was on the line and saved the net from complete shutdown, at least for now. I'd say that makes you an elite agent.

SUPERPHREAK: DISARRAY was so arrogant that he never disguised his upload location. Once Nightfall was destroyed, we traced his signal back to his home. S.M.A.R.T. agents are on their way right now to apprehend him.

SUPERPHREAK: It turns out he was working on this plan for years. All the time DISARRAY was a S.M.A.R.T. agent, he was really just casing the network in preparation for his master plan. But that's all over now.
SUPERPHREAK: What now? Well, until S.M.A.R.T. has another crisis for us to solve, take a break. You earned it. Kick back, relax, play some video games. :) CUL8R.
